segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Add File Type Association Dialog Box

segment.source: Use the Add File Type Association dialog box to add a file type association for the application.
segment.target: Use the Add File Type Association dialog box to add a file type association for the application.

segment.source: To access this dialog box, click File Type associations on the Configure Application page and click Add.
segment.target: To access this dialog box, click File Type associations on the Configure Application page and click Add.

segment.source: This dialog box contains the following elements.
segment.target: This dialog box contains the following elements.

segment.source: Extension
segment.target: Extension

segment.source: Use to specify the file name extension for the file type associated with the application.
segment.target: Use to specify the file name extension for the file type associated with the application.

segment.source: File Type Description
segment.target: File Type Description

segment.source: Use to specify a brief description of the file type.
segment.target: Use to specify a brief description of the file type.

segment.source: Content Type
segment.target: Content Type

segment.source: Use to specify a brief description of the MIME type.
segment.target: Use to specify a brief description of the MIME type.

segment.source: Perceived Type
segment.target: Perceived Type

segment.source: Use to select a file type.
segment.target: Use to select a file type.

segment.source: Confirm open after download
segment.target: Confirm open after download

segment.source: Select to confirm that the file is opened after a download.
segment.target: Select to confirm that the file is opened after a download.

segment.source: Always show extension
segment.target: Always show extension

segment.source: Select to display the extension with the file name.
segment.target: Select to display the extension with the file name.

segment.source: Add to New menu
segment.target: Add to New menu

segment.source: Select to add the file type to the New menu.
segment.target: Select to add the file type to the New menu.

segment.target: Related topics
